Ability.Name: Necrotic Strike
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",51124) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Outbreak
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target",50435,"PLAYER") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Howling Blast
Ability.Lua: if ( select(3,GetRuneCooldown(1)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(2)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(3)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(4)) == false ) or IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(73975))) == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Death Coil
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",49039) then PQR_CustomTarget = "player" return true else if IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(73975))) == 0 then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" return true end end

Ability.Name: Frost Strike
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",49039) == nil and UnitPower("player") > 90 then return true end

Ability.Name: Horn of Winter
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 57330) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Lichborne
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 70 then return true end

Ability.Name: Raise Dead
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 80 and GetSpellCooldown(49039) ~= 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Death Pact
Ability.Lua: if GetTotemInfo(1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Death Grip
--- offensive spells ---
Ability.Lua: if UnitIsDead("target") or ImmuneTarget("target") or not UnitCanAttack("player","target") or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not SpecialAggro("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) then return true end

Ability.Name: Pillar of Frost
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") < 50 then return true end

Ability.Name: Strangulate
Ability.Lua: if GetSpellCooldown(47528) ~= 0 and select(9,UnitCastingInfo("target")) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: Empower Rune Weapon
Ability.Lua: if select(3,GetRuneCooldown(1)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(2)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(3)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(4)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(5)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(6)) == false and 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") < 50 then return true end

Ability.Name: Anti-Magic Shell
Ability.Lua: local i = 1 local buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitDebuff("player", i) while buff do if bufftype then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitDebuff("player", i) end

Ability.Name: Will of the Forsaken
Ability.Lua:
if not GotFear then function GotFear(t) local debuff = { 10326, 8122, 2094, 5782, 5484, 6358, 5246 } for _,v in ipairs(debuff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end end
if GotFear("player") and IsSpellKnown(7744) then return true end

Ability.Name: Icebound Fortitude
Ability.Lua:
local debuff = { 5211, 9005, 71757, 853, 1833, 12809, 46968, 85388 }
for i,v in ipairs(debuff) do if UnitDebuffID("player",v) then return true end end

Ability.Name: Obliterate
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",51124) then return true end

Ability.Name: Blood Tap
Ability.Lua: if select(3,GetRuneCooldown(1)) == false and select(3,GetRuneCooldown(2)) == false and UnitBuffID("player",49039) == nil and UnitBuffID("player",51124) then return true end

Ability.Name: --- initialize ---
Ability.Lua:
if not xeroninit then
function SpecialAggro(t) local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot", "Icy Tomb", "Risen Ghoul", "Mana Void", "Burning Tendons", "Wing Tentacle", "Arm Tentacle", "Twilight Assault Drake", "Goriona", "Ice Tomb", "Twilight Sapper", "Dreadlord Debilitator" } for _,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName(t) == v then return true end end end
function ImmuneTarget(t) local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977, 102915, 100686, 105784, 74938 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
function HoldCooldown(cd) if GetMinimapZoneText() == "Deathwing" and UnitName("target") ~= "Burning Tendons" and cd >= 1 then return true end if UnitName("target") == "Warlord Zon'ozz" and not UnitDebuffID("target",104031) and cd >= 3 then return true end if UnitName("boss1") == "Alysrazor" and not UnitDebuffID("boss1",99432) and cd >= 3 then return true end end
if UnitLevel("player") ~= 85 then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFLevel 85 is required to use this profile properly") end
if GetLocale() ~= "enUS" then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFenUS language pack is required to use this profile properly") end
print("Sheuron initialized, ver: \124cFFFFE6402012.02.08") xeroninit = true
end
if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",80169) or UnitBuffID("player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("player") then return true end
